splits.name: Fitness-For-Service Standards
splits.description: Standards and codes specifically addressing fitness-for-service and integrity assessment of equipment.

splits.name: Pressure Vessel and Construction Standards
splits.description: Standards and codes for construction, inspection, and operation of pressure vessels and related equipment.

splits.name: Corrosion and Risk-Based Standards
splits.description: Standards and guidelines for corrosion control, risk-based inspection, and safe operation in industrial settings.

args.justification: The class 'Engineering and Industry Standards' is overloaded, containing distinct subdomains: fitness-for-service, pressure vessel/construction, and corrosion/risk-based standards. Splitting improves schema clarity and aligns with entity semantics.

args.new_description: Standards and reports detailing fitness-for-service evaluation procedures and integrity assessment for pressure vessels, tanks, and piping.
args.justification: Both classes focus on fitness-for-service evaluation and integrity assessment, with one being a standard and the other a report; merging reflects their semantic overlap and practical interchangeability.
Assigning/confirming correct Class_Group for merged Fitness-For-Service class.
Assigning/confirming correct Class_Group for Pressure Vessel and Construction Standards.
Assigning/confirming correct Class_Group for Corrosion and Risk-Based Standards.
Class_Group is already correct for Engineering Reference Materials; confirming assignment.
